content: Singaporean actor **Shawn Lee Chuang Rui** ([simplified Chinese](/wiki/Simplified_Chinese_characters): 李创锐; [traditional Chinese](/wiki/Traditional_Chinese_characters): 李創銳; [pinyin](/wiki/Pinyin): *Li Chuàngruì*; born 11 February 1990), is a Singaporean who formerly worked as an actor. He first came into prominence for his award-winning performance alongside his friend and co-star [Joshua Ang](/wiki/Joshua_Ang) in the box office hit *[I Not Stupid](/wiki/I_Not_Stupid)*. and its sequel, *[I Not Stupid Too](/wiki/I_Not_Stupid_Too)*. ## Career Lee first joined his acting career in 1999. He acted as a primary school student along with deceased actor [Aloysius Pang](/wiki/Aloysius_Pang) in *My Teacher, My Buddy*. In 2002, he was one of four child actors who successfully auditioned for the child lead roles in [Jack Neo](/wiki/Jack_Neo)'s hit film *[I Not Stupid](/wiki/I_Not_Stupid)*. His performance in the sitcom adaptation earned him a nomination for the Best Young Talent award, which he won, along with co-stars [Joshua Ang](/wiki/Joshua_Ang) and [Huang Po Ju](/wiki/Huang_Po_Ju) at the [2002 Star Awards](/wiki/Star_Awards_2002). He would continue starring alongside them in Neo's next successful period film *[Homerun](/wiki/Homerun_(film))* and also the sequel to *I Not Stupid*, known as *[I Not Stupid Too](/wiki/I_Not_Stupid_Too)* respectively. He filmed his last movie alongside Huang in 2007 known as *Colour of Hope* before leaving the entertainment industry to concentrate on his [A Levels](/wiki/Singapore-Cambridge_GCE_Advanced_Level). Lee made a brief return to acting in Neo's new film *[We Not Naughty](/wiki/We_Not_Naughty)*, which was released in conjunction with [Chinese New Year](/wiki/Chinese_New_Year) 2012 and features former *I Not Stupid* and *I Not Stupid Too* co-stars Ang and [Xiang Yun](/wiki/Xiang_Yun). ## Personal life Lee studied at [Unity Primary School](/wiki/Unity_Primary_School), [Bukit Panjang Government High School](/wiki/Bukit_Panjang_Government_High_School) and subsequently completed his A Levels at [Anglo-Chinese Junior College](/wiki/Anglo-Chinese_Junior_College). Lee graduated with a business degree at the [National University of Singapore](/wiki/National_University_of_Singapore). ## Filmography ### Films YearMovieRoleNotesRef2002*[I Not Stupid](/wiki/I_Not_Stupid)*Liu Kok Pin 刘国彬2003*[Homerun](/wiki/Homerun_(film))*Chew Kiat Kun 周杰坤2006*[I Not Stupid Too](/wiki/I_Not_Stupid_Too)*Tom Yeo 杨学谦2007*Colour Of Hope* 再见阳光Orange Light/Liu Chengguang2012*[We Not Naughty](/wiki/We_Not_Naughty)*Chen Weijie ### Television YearMovieRoleNotesRef1999*My Teacher, My Buddy***unknown**2001*[Beyond the Axis of Truth](/wiki/Beyond_the_Axis_of_Truth)*Chen Xueming (younger)2002*I Not Stupid*Liu Kok Pin2006*[I Not Stupid Too](/wiki/I_Not_Stupid_Too_(TV_series))*Tom Yeo ## Awards and nominations YearAwardCategoryNominated workResultRef2002[Star Awards](/wiki/Star_Awards_2002)Young Talent Award*I Not Stupid*Won - Shawn Lee at [IMDb](/wiki/IMDb_(identifier)) - Profile on J-Team website This article about a Singaporean actor is a stub.
